name: Fungaland
description:
In the magical village of Shroomville, vegetation that would be plain & mundane in any other world, are given sentience by means of magical spores from the great Mushroom of Life. 

With the gift of life given by their ancient progenitor, the vegetation of Shroomville created language, tools and, eventually, a society built on the various skills of its members. As the village Craftsman, Shroomy has stepped up and become a local hero, using his crafting skills to help his fellow people the Shroomins to defend their home of Shroomville from the Locust Raiders and build up their village to make it a safer place to live.
